mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.role, r.description FROM sys_users u, sys_roles r, sys_users_roles ur WHERE u.username = #{username} AND u.id = ur.user_id AND r.id = ur.role_id

SELECT p.id, p.permission, p.description FROM sys_users u, sys_roles r, sys_permissions p, sys_users_roles ur, sys_roles_permissions rp WHERE u.username = #{username} AND u.id = ur.user_id AND r.id = ur.role_id AND r.id = rp.role_id AND p.id = rp.permission_id
